title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is chosen
description: The ControlExampleText component emits a beep sound when SWT.MULTI is selected, which is not the expected behavior.
OB: After selecting SWT.MULTI, clicking on other buttons in the ControlExampleText also triggers the beep sound.
EB: The ControlExampleText should not emit a beep sound when SWT.MULTI is chosen, and clicking on other buttons should not produce the beep sound either.
SR:
To reproduce this issue: 
1. Open the SWT example ControlExample. 
2. Go to the Text tab. 
3. Select Styles -> SWT.SINGLE. 
4. Select Styles -> SWT.MULTI.
